name: crs-monorepo
description: A centralized college management system with modules for Faculty, Alumni, Events, and Library â€” built with secure RBAC, reusable components, and automated containerized deployment.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c "cyan,yellow" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build:backend: npm run build --workspace=backend || echo 'No backend build step defined'
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c "cyan,yellow" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend"
